item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Abhinav an engineer, tinkerer and lifelong learner. Welcome to my little (and as of now, somewhat barren) scratchpad on the internet. I’m currently studying Computer Science and Engineering at PES University. I’ve worked as an Software Engineering Intern at Arista Networks in the summer of 2024, and as a open-source contributor in Google Summer of Code in the summer of 2023. I’m interested in Game Development, Computer Graphics, and low level systems in general.

item.title: Projects
item.description: PandaFS Distributed File System written in Go with built-in replication and fault tolerance for datanodes. Supports a tree based hierarchy with standard metadata operations. NCFE-EVM Computer voting program using Python, Flask, HTML/CSS, and MongoDB. Deployed in the real world to service over 1000+ voters. Tungsten (WIP) Centralised Version Control System Ã la Subversion and Perforce. Built to version video game projects. Written in Rust. quickhash Rust application to find and the verify checksum(s) of a file or directory of files.
